Class HDBOfficerMenu

java.lang.Object
views.HDBOfficerMenu
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserController.PasswordChangeView
public class HDBOfficerMenu extends Object implements UserController.PasswordChangeView
Handles the display and input for the HDB Officer user interface. Implements PasswordChangeView for the password change functionality.

  • Method Details

    • displayOfficerMenu

      public int displayOfficerMenu(String handlingProjectName)
      Displays the main menu for HDB Officers and gets their choice.
      Parameters:
      handlingProjectName - The name of the project currently handled by the officer, or null.
      Returns:
      The integer choice selected by the user.

    • displayProjectsForRegistration

      public void displayProjectsForRegistration(List<Project> projects)
      Displays a list of projects specifically for Officer Registration selection.
      Parameters:
      projects - List of projects open for registration.

    • displayProjectDetails

      public void displayProjectDetails(Project project)
      Displays detailed information about a specific project.
      Parameters:
      project - The Project object to display.

    • displayRegistrationList

      public void displayRegistrationList(List<HDBOfficerRegistration> registrations)
      Displays a list of the officer's registration requests.
      Parameters:
      registrations - List of HDBOfficerRegistration objects.

    • displayRegistrationResult

      public void displayRegistrationResult(boolean success, String action)
      Displays the result of a registration request submission.
      Parameters:
      success - true if successful, false otherwise.
      action - The action performed (e.g., "submitted").
